txt.en: The gate to the throne-room of Tharrazhâr has been sealed by the forces of Gundabad and the mechanism to open it is missing a piece. You should find the missing piece of the gate mechanism.
You have found the missing piece of the gate mechanism - a steel-wrought handle!
With a heavy creak, the gate opens!
You have cleared a path to the hobgoblin leading the forces of Gundabad in the Keep of Tharrazhâr. You should defeat Graznúl.
You have found the missing piece of the gate mechanism, and you should now use the gate mechanism to open the gate to the throne-room of Tharrazhâr.
Open the gate to the Throne of Tharrazhâr
DNT Investigate the noise coming from the Depths of Akhatâr
Led by a terrible hobgoblin, the forces of Gundabad have invaded the Keep of Tharrazhâr. You have been charged with repelling their attack and securing Skarháld.
DNT A drake-wight attacks from the depths!
Find the missing piece of the gate mechanism
'You fought with valour, [placeholder]! Let us return and bring word of your victory to Hórin!'
Find the missing piece of the gate mechanism
You take the missing piece of the gate mechanism
